data.eml:eml: Two new glyptosternine catfishes (Teleostei: Sisoridae) from Vietnam and China.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heok Hee Ng (2004): Two new glyptosternine catfishes (Teleostei: Sisoridae) from Vietnam and China. Zootaxa 428: 1-12, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:BFEF4C79-EDC0-4FED-BF8F-E3320FA684EB
